de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.commons.core
Interface GameEngine

public interface GameEngine

The game engine. A facade interface, that represents a lightweight subsystem access.

Since:
1.0
Version:
$Id: GameEngine.java 790 2010-07-05 23:25:55Z cbollmann@stud.hs-bremen.de $
